IEX|NYC|Full-time|Onsite|iextrading.com

At IEX, we’re building scalable technology to achieve our mission of creating fairer financial markets. We’re currently looking to hire for the below roles, to help our team scale our core cloud and network infrastructure as we build new products and services to better serve our core customers. Check out our open roles here: https://grnh.se/5wogdx

Systems Engineer Full Stack Engineer Data Engineer Software Engineer *Test Automation Engineer
